title: How to Make a Working Fridge in Minecraft

steps.title: Place any block next to it.
steps.content: Place any block next to it. Then, put a piece of redstone on top.

steps.title: Place a lever on that block, too.
steps.content: Place a lever on that block, too.

steps.title: Make sure the door opens outwards, not inwards.
steps.content: Make sure the door opens outwards, not inwards.

steps.title: Place any two blocks two spaces behind the door.
steps.content: Place any two blocks two spaces behind the door.

steps.title: Mine the blocks behind the dispenser.
steps.content: Mine the blocks behind the dispenser.
